price: (Rabbiin) ni jedha: “Akka kanatti keeyyattoonni keenya sitti dhuftee, ishee dagatte, Atis hardha akkuma kanatti dagatamta.”
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika atatka āyātunā fanasītahā wakadhālika al-yawma tunsā
